titles.title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the 'William Stafford United States Courthouse'.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 12/14/2005--Introduced. Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the William Stafford United States Courthouse.
